description: Newcomers go out of their way to welcome pets and patrons with treats and special menus. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Feasting with fur kids: New pet-friendly cafes spring up around Singapore
title_page: Feasting with fur kids: New pet-friendly cafes spring up around Singapore | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Dining out is no longer the prerogative of just humans.
A slew of restaurants and cafes have embraced a new category of patrons – pets.
